trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the image.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o formato de arquivo da imagem.

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: Não herdável.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class indicate image formats such as bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), enhanced metafile (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), and icon (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).
trans-unit.target: As propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> classe indicar formatos de imagem como bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), metarquivo avançado (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>) e o ícone (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify an image format when saving an image using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar as propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> classe para especificar um formato de imagem ao salvar uma imagem usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can compare two image formats by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode comparar dois formatos de imagem usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that specifies a particular image format.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que especifica um formato de imagem específico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />, usando a estrutura <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Typically you use the static properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify a particular format such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, rather than constructing a new <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você usa as propriedades estáticas do <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> classe para especificar um formato específico como <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, em vez de criar um novo <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap (BMP) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de bitmap (BMP).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the bitmap image format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de imagem bitmap.

trans-unit.source: Gets the enhanced metafile (EMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem EMF (Metarquivo Avançado).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the enhanced metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> objeto que indica o formato de imagem de metarquivo aprimorado.

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o objeto especificado é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> equivalente a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="o" /> é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> equivalente a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Exchangeable Image File (Exif) format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Formato EXIF.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Exif format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato EXIF.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor do código hash que representa este objeto.

trans-unit.source: A hash code that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash que representa esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem GIF (Graphics Interchange Format).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the GIF image format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de imagem GIF.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que representa esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que representa esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem de ícone do Windows.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows icon image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> objeto que indica o formato de imagem de ícone do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem JPEG (Joint Photographic Experts Group).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the JPEG image format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de imagem JPEG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de um bitmap na memória.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de um bitmap na memória.

trans-unit.source: Gets the W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem PNG (Portable Network Graphics) do W3C.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the PNG image format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de imagem PNG.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem TIFF.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the TIFF image format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> que indica o formato de imagem TIFF.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> em uma cadeia de caracteres legível.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows metafile (WMF) image format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de imagem WMF (metarquivo do Windows).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows metafile image format.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> objeto que indica o formato de imagem de metarquivo do Windows.
